00012 CentimeterUnit::CentimeterUnit()
00013         : DataspaceUnit("centimeter")
00014 {;}

00018 {;}
00019                 
00020 
00021 void CentimeterUnit::convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output)
00022 {
00023         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00024         *output = atom_getfloat(inputAtoms) * 0.01;
00025 }
00026 
00027 
00028 void CentimeterUnit::convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms)
00029 {
00030         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00031         atom_setfloat(*outputAtoms, *input * 100.0);
00032 }

00045 void FootUnit::convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output)
00046 {
00047         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00048         *output = atom_getfloat(inputAtoms) / 3.281;
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 void FootUnit::convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms)
00053 {
00054         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00055         atom_setfloat(*outputAtoms, (*input * 3.281));
00056 }

00093 void MeterUnit::convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output)

00095         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00096         *output = atom_getfloat(inputAtoms);

00099 
00100 void MeterUnit::convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms)
00101 {
00102         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00103         atom_setfloat(*outputAtoms, *input);
00104 }

00107 /***********************************************************************************************/
00108 DistanceDataspace::DistanceDataspace()
00109         : DataspaceLib("distance", "meter")
00110 {
00111         // Create one of each kind of unit, and cache them in a hash
00112         registerUnit(new CentimeterUnit,        gensym("cm"));
00113         registerUnit(new CentimeterUnit,        gensym("centimeter"));
00114         registerUnit(new FootUnit,                      gensym("'"));
00115         registerUnit(new FootUnit,                      gensym("feet"));
00116         registerUnit(new InchUnit,                      gensym("\""));
00117         registerUnit(new InchUnit,                      gensym("inches"));
00118         registerUnit(new MeterUnit,                     gensym("m"));
00119         registerUnit(new MeterUnit,                     gensym("meters"));
00120         
00121         // Now that the cache is created, we can create a set of default units
00122         setInputUnit(neutralUnit);
00123         setOutputUnit(neutralUnit);
00124 }
00125

00128 {
00129         ;
00130 }
